
add_custom_command (
  OUTPUT  VAudioContentProtectionPacket.cpp
          VAudioContentProtectionPacket.h
          VAudioContentProtectionPacket__Syms.cpp
          VAudioContentProtectionPacket__Syms.h
  DEPENDS AudioContentProtectionPacket.v
  COMMAND perl ${VERILATOR} ${VERILATOR_OPTS} -Mdir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR} -cc
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/AudioContentProtectionPacket.v
)

# Verilog .v files are added here so that they get added to any IDE project generated by CMake.
add_library (VAudioContentProtectionPacket STATIC VAudioContentProtectionPacket.cpp VAudioContentProtectionPacket__Syms.cpp
    AudioContentProtectionPacket.v
)

target_compile_options(VAudioContentProtectionPacket PRIVATE ${VK_CPPFLAGS})

target_include_directories(VAudioContentProtectionPacket PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})

target_link_libraries(VAudioContentProtectionPacket verilated)
